title: Mayyu Ali
subtitle:
Following gun-shot to a local #Bangladeshi leader last night, local people are furious and destroyed shelters and stuffs of #Rohingya refugees in camp 27.

This should not be reason of frightening refugees to go back to #Myanmar in coercion. 

#Bangladesh should protect refugees. pic.twitter.com/W1NgWoSnZ8

title: Lone Wolf Ratnakar
subtitle: Burma Bazaar, one of Chennai's well known 2nd hand goods market, esp for it's Phoren goods( actually the smuggled stuff), is so called after Tamil refugees who had fled Burma in the 1960s. Yes there were many Tamilians settled in Burma, most of traders #MadrasDaypic.twitter.com/yogqgq94AS
